name: dumbdo
description: DumbDo is a basic self-hosted to-do list app. It focuses on straightforward task management with lists, completion status, and a clutter-free interface designed for users who want local control over their task data.

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: Keep all task information on your own server for privacy and control over personal data

features.title: REST API
features.description: Add new tasks rapidly with minimal clicks to capture ideas and action items as they

features.title: List Management
features.description: Rename, delete, or reorder lists to adapt your organization system as needs change

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Access and update tasks from any device with a browser that adapts to screen size
